1em}.dailyMenu,.reviews,nav div{padding:.3em .8em}.addReview,.review{padding:.1em 20%}.cost{text-align:right}.dishCnt span{display:block}article{background:var(--secondBackground);color:var(--mainColor);padding:2em}.restaurantContainer{padding:1em;margin:0 ";position:absolute;width:30px;height:30px;border-radius:50%;top:0;left:0;background:#757575;border:.2px solid #000;transform:scale(1.1);transition:.5s}.restaurantContainer
